articles.title: Queen announces future 'Queen Camilla' in message
articles.description: Camilla should have the title when Charles becomes King, the Queen says in a message to mark her Platinum Jubilee.
articles.content:
By Sean CoughlanRoyal correspondent
Image source, Chris Jackson
The Queen has announced she wants Camilla, the Duchess of Cornwall, to be known as Queen when Prince Charles becomes King.

articles.title: Camilla will be Queen: Elizabeth II uses Platinum Jubilee message to elevate Charles' second wife
articles.description: Britain's Queen Elizabeth II has used the historic milestone of her Platinum Jubilee to redefine the future of the monarchy, calling for the Duchess of Cornwall to be known as Queen Camilla when Charles becomes King.

articles.author: Richard Sandomir
articles.title: Lusia Harris, ‘Queen of Basketball,’ Dies at 66
articles.description: She was the only woman officially drafted by the N.B.A. and the first Black woman inducted into the Basketball Hall of Fame.
